definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:GuardingStrike</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">ABSORPTION</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:GuardingStrike</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
